scripts.build:bot: rm -rf dist/bot && mkdir -p dist/bot/prisma && bun build src/index.ts src/workers/bot.ts src/workers/render.ts --outdir dist/bot --target=bun --splitting --sourcemap=inline --external sharp && cp -R src/lang dist/bot/lang && prisma generate && cp prisma/schema.prisma dist/bot/prisma/schema.prisma && cp -R node_modules/prisma/*.node dist/bot/prisma && cd dist/bot && bun init -y && bun add sharp
scripts.build:website: prisma generate && cd packages/website && bun run build && cd ../..
scripts.dev:website: cd packages/website && bun run dev && cd ../..
